name: Particle Cannon
description:
Two imperfect superintelligences duke it out over the remaining matter in the universe. Using tanks.

A two-player (or versus AI) artillery game demo I made for class, where the twist is that it's real-time, not turn-based. Heavily inspired by this flash game I spent hours playing in high school, with writing inspired by Universal Paperclips. Check out my full behind-the-scenes commentary!

A debug mode is accessible by pressing the ` key. This exposes some stats.

The rollover of your keyboard might cause input problems in two-player mode. Try using the 0 key on the numpad to fire, or plug in a second keyboard!

Music: "Voxel Revolution" and "Orion 300XB" by Kevin MacLeod (license)
